stepTitle: A $$0.0250-kg$$ bullet is accelerated from rest to a speed of $$550$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in a $$3.00-kg$$ rifle. the pain of the rifle’s kick is much worse if you hold the gun loosely a few centimeters from your shoulder rather than holding it tightly against your shoulder. Calculate the recoil velocity of the rifle if it is held loosely away from the shoulder.
